content:
# The execution result confirms that I successfully harvested 10 stone, and the inventory now reflects the updated contents: `{'stone': 10, 'iron-ore': 10}`.

# Now that I have both iron ore and stone in my inventory, I can proceed to craft a stone furnace. 
# I will attempt to craft one stone furnace now.

craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Crafting a single stone furnace.
